basics.name: Phan Thi Ngoc Hang
basics.label: Data enthusiast
basics.summary: Third-year International Economics student (at Foreign Trade University) passionate about data and business analysis with a solid foundation in data analysis and business understanding through structured coursework. Seeking internships or entry-level roles to apply analytical skills to real business problems.

Activities.summary: Analyzed page performance (25K followers) to identify high-performing content and adjust posting schedule to increase overall engagement.
Implemented KPI reporting and recommended data-driven content strategies to help the team meet communication goals faster.

education.institution: Foreign Trade University, Hanoi Campus, Vietnam
courses: Programming For Data Analysis and Scientific Computing
